abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32541302, pmid32543892, pmid32520832, pmid32444427, pmid32543703, pmid32525852, pmid32443020, pmid32546018, pmid32542946, pmid32497287, pmid32531024, pmid32544232, pmid32443023, pmid32442052, pmid32444382, pmid32539587, pmid32443151, pmid32544099, pmid32543906, pmid32543705, pmid32536749, pmid32516861, pmid32544242, pmid32518071, pmid32524645, pmid32543304, pmid32444415, pmid32442259
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.22
